text: Gerardus Willem "Wim" Anderiesen Jr. (2 September 1931 - 27 January 2017) was a Dutch footballer. He played as a defender at club level from the early-1950s to the mid-1960s. He played for Ajax from 1951 to 1961. He later played for Holland Sport. Anderiesen was born in Amsterdam, North Holland. He was named after his father Wim Anderiesen (1903-1944). He died on 27 January 2017 in Heerhugowaard at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Footballers from Amsterdam
title: Wim Anderiesen Jr.
